column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
hi i've pain in the stomach
Hi! Could you tell me a bit more information about the pain you're experiencing? Where is the pain located, and when did it start? What kind of pain is it? Does anything make it worse or better?
normally painters in the evening it's quite in the upper part of the abdomen and it makes them worse if i'm drinking beer or alcohol

It sounds like you may be experiencing gastritis or a stomach ulcer. I recommend avoiding anything that irritates the stomach including alcohol, caffeine, spicy food, and smoking. It would be best to keep track of your symptoms and contact your doctor for further diagnosis and treatment.
You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?
Alright! If any other medical issues come up, donâ€™t hesitate to reach out. Take care and stay safe!
